channel.title: Gold Farming?
channel.description:
I bought 5M gold-farming for $3 USD (don't say I got ripped off, cause I could care less if you could make that in a day or not). When they logged off in the middle of the gold farming, I noticed. They were power-mining pure ess. So just a tip for everybody looking to make a few M's a day, power-mine P-Essence.
Anybody else bought RS gold-farming and figured out the method they use?

item.title: Gold Farming?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Pouch, post:20, topic:357150”]JaGex will get the gold farmers and catch you ordering!

THE CATCH TEAM

that’s really them, its under the offical runescape.com website.[/quote]
Its funny, I have botted alot of this account (around 8-10 hours daily btw), and they botted 48 hours straight. I don’t see exactly where I am caught yet.

Read full topic

item.title: Gold Farming?
item.dc:creator: @ajisamazing ajisamazing
item.description:
@ajisamazing wrote:

If your account is a higher level they kill Green Dragons. Too bad I lost my main account that had 99 strength and 110M. They got my account permanently banned and they can’t replace it. I also lost my pure for botting my hunter to 99. Gf RS as I lost two of my accounts forever within 2 days. Note: This just recently happened.

Read full topic

item.title: Gold Farming?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:17, topic:357150”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=453670.msg3325401#msg3325401 date=1283060014]

Funny thing, after they finished my 5M I bought, (took them over double the said amount of time btw…), I logged on, (after already knowing there method?), and checked GE history to double-check, because it went from 1.5M in the first day, to 5M the next. Sure enough, nothing but P. Ess was botted, and they forgot to buy 1 more needle so it would block it from history
[/quote]Did you expect them to change what they were doing?

Well since the amount of GP increased more than double earned the 2nd day, I did suspect a change, but no, there wasn’t. Oh well, there ‘timely’ service is not right, as it will take double to 3 times the said amount of time needed to actually complete your order.[/quote]My orders were EXTREMELY slow, but cheap.

Read full topic

item.title: Gold Farming?
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

I find it is easier just to leave a bot running for free Runecrafting airs is fantastic money after about level 60. Even on ftp. Which is what I am on.

Read full topic

item.title: Gold Farming?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:16, topic:357150”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=453670.msg3325387#msg3325387 date=1283057739]
Funny thing, after they finished my 5M I bought, (took them over double the said amount of time btw…), I logged on, (after already knowing there method?), and checked GE history to double-check, because it went from 1.5M in the first day, to 5M the next. Sure enough, nothing but P. Ess was botted, and they forgot to buy 1 more needle so it would block it from history
[/quote]Did you expect them to change what they were doing?[/quote]
Well since the amount of GP increased more than double earned the 2nd day, I did suspect a change, but no, there wasn’t. Oh well, there ‘timely’ service is not right, as it will take double to 3 times the said amount of time needed to actually complete your order.

Read full topic

item.title: Gold Farming?
item.dc:creator: @David_Shift David Shift
item.description:
@David_Shift wrote:

Lol Jeddac, I’ve been doing that for a few hours while I auto alch. I ended up trapping about 20-30 people on world 112 for a couple of hours. Just place a cannon one tile away from the door.

Read full topic

item.title: Gold Farming?
item.dc:creator: @jeddac jeddac
item.description:
@jeddac wrote:

but so easy to stop the bots, watch, i’ve been lurking another forum that’s been trapping r-ess bots simply with a cannon, it upsets their walk pattern or something :s
then they just get a mod/j mod along to sort them out :\

item.title: Gold Farming?
item.dc:creator: @David_Shift David Shift
item.description:
@David_Shift wrote:

Just get a VPS and bot Pure Essence 24/7, I botted for 2 days straight without getting banned (Kinda shows Jagex doesn’t give a shit?)

Right now you get 5K per run, 1:30 each run from bank to ess to bank.

Read full topic

item.title: Gold Farming?
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

They bot so anything botters do for money they do.

item.title: Gold Farming?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:5, topic:357150”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=453670.msg3322983#msg3322983 date=1282861989]

I bought a Mil for like 3 bucks 2 years ago. I can make like 4m a night botting pure essence.

But also, Jagex watches Pure ess, and Soul Wars very closely.

When I obtained my 1m, It had no stats, or exp gained, and it took like 6 hours…

Just did the calculations, and if I didn’t mess up, it would take around 27-28k pure ess, if sold at max price atm.
[/quote]

Unless Rune Ess went up in price. (Used to be 250 gp 6 months ago)

I can mine 12k ess in a night of botting. Soo.[/quote]

Currently at 179GP max.

Read full topic
